title: Build a Netflix Clone with React and Tailwind CSS
summary: Learn how to build a fully responsive Netflix clone from scratch. This tutorial covers React hooks, functional components, and styling with Tailwind CSS to create a beautiful and modern UI. You'll also learn how to fetch movie data from an API.

title: Create a 3D Portfolio with Three.js and React
summary: Take your portfolio to the next dimension! This tutorial guides you through creating a stunning 3D portfolio website using Three.js for 3D rendering and React for the UI. Learn about models, lighting, and camera controls.

title: Node.js Crash Course - Build a REST API
summary: A comprehensive crash course on Node.js and Express. You'll learn how to build a complete REST API with routes, controllers, and middleware for a simple task management application. Perfect for beginners looking to get into backend development.

title: Learn Django by Building a Blog
summary: Master the Django framework by building a feature-rich blog application. This series covers models, views, templates, user authentication, and the Django admin panel. A great project to understand the MVT architecture.

title: MERN Stack E-commerce App from Scratch
summary: Build a complete e-commerce platform using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). This extensive tutorial covers everything from setting up the backend API to creating a dynamic, stateful frontend with Redux for state management.

title: React Native Crash Course: Build a Weather App
summary: Get started with mobile app development using React Native. In this crash course, you will build a clean and functional weather app that fetches data from a third-party API and displays it to the user. Covers components, state, and API calls.
prerequisites: React basics are helpful but not required

title: Flutter & Firebase Chat App
summary: Create a real-time chat application for iOS and Android using Flutter and Firebase. This project covers Firestore for the database, Firebase Authentication for user management, and Push Notifications to engage users.
